attributes.action: Get District/Borough/City and Metropolitan areas councils to  say how much that area pays towards Bus Consessionary fares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The National consesionary fare is set at 77p per person, and per journey for those who have a bus pass.
Some councils have lower figures, which have resulted in these councils, including County Councils, having massive debts.
For example a 49p consession on a journey valued at a £4 single journey leaves the respect bus operator with a debt of £3.51p multiple figures , as number of journeys per calender month, will amass to £000, oooo debt to the bus company, resulting in service withdrawls in rural areas.

rejection.details: We suggest you contac the councils directly. If they do not provide the information you are requesting you may want to use a Freedom of Information Request.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
